title: Setting up Your Script
description:
• Click and hold the flag block, and move your mouse to the right
  • The "flag" block controls the start of the program
  • Now you can write a short program to place a plait
  • The "go to" block will tell the program where to start on the screen
  • The "set size" block will set the size of the plait
  • The "clear" block will erase all the prior drawings
  • The "set angle" block will set the angle of the plait

title: Creating Another Plait
description:
• Use the "stamp" block to "stamp" an image of the plait here
  • Then use the "translate" block to move in the direction determined by "angle"

title: Creating Multiple Plaits
description:
• Drag in the "repeat" block
  • The "flag" block controls the start of the program
  • Put the "stamp" and "translate by" blocks inside the "repeat" block
  • Set the number of repetitions in the block
short: Create a braid using multiple plaits.

title: Curling the Braid
description:
• The braid should be curved to follow the shape of one's head
  • Drag the "rotate" block into the "repeat" block
  • Set the amount of rotation (larger numbers lead to tighter spirals)
short: Add a curve to your braid.

title: Scaling the Braid Size
description:
• Drag in the "scale by" block into the "repeat" block
  • Set the value of the scale (small numbers shrink faster)
short: Scale the size of your braid.

title: Creating Multiple Braids Using Loops
description:
• Take your braid (the 'repeat' block) and put it inside another repeat block
  • After each braid, you will need to set size, angle, and position
  • To make the size larger, use the 'scale by' block in your repeat loop after your braid, and make the number >100% (try 300)
  • To reset the angle your can use the 'point at angle' block

title: Resetting the Braid's Position
description:
• You can change the start location, try the upper left (-200,200)
  • You can change the angle of rotation (-7 goes counter clockwise)
  • To move the braid, use the 'translate by' blocks to shift up and left
short: Update the position of your braids.

title: Adding Some Color
description:
• Add in the "set costume color" block to the beginning
  • Play with the value

title: Next Steps
nextSteps: You completed the tutorial. You should now be able to create your own patterns in the software by yourself!
